page.title: 03DURNESS PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: Durness Primary School was rebuilt in 1911.In 1957 electric lighting was installed,followed by central heating in 1958. Before this the school was heated by peats which the children brought in.In 1959 the school was extended to provide two extra classrooms and toilets which were used for junior secondary education.Today there is only a Primary department with two full time teachers.There are various visiting teachers,gym,art, chanter and the minister.The school is very well equipped and well maintained.It is surrounded by a large playground and close by is a big playing field with play equipment.When we have to go to secondary school we travel to Dornoch or Golspie each week and get home on a Friday and go back on Sunday night.In Dornoch and Golspie the teenagers stay in hostels.
